price: (62) And you have already known the first creation, so will you not remember?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُمُ ٱلنَّشۡأَةَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ فَلَوۡلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿalim'tumu al-nashata al-ūlā falawlā tadhakkarūna
